title: Yi for bronze...
body: ALRIGHT RIOT PLEASE. YOU BUFFED YI AGAIN ON PATH 6.10...... CAN U PLEASE THINK ABOUT THE BRONZE,SILVER AND GOLD PLAYERS LIKE YI WITH HIS E BUFF  STARTS 0/3 THEN STILL DOES STILL SOO MUCH DAMAGE LIKE WTF??????????? RIOT PLEASE JUST NERF YI FOR OUR BRONZE AND SILVER PLAYERS THANK YOU

replies.body: at least you can acknowledge that this is only a problem in low elo

I hope this helps you
http://lolcounter.com/champions/masteryi
I play a lot of normal games, and more than not, I see him get dumpstered in team fights. If there's one thing I think should be changed in Yi's kit, it's his immunity to slows.

Permaban, hard cc, or pick teemo.

Choose your poison.
